text: Geukheun boh tamong dalam meuligoe Teuma diputroe hireuen that leupah Geusangka geubloh dalam ie laot ; Ija geubeu-ot beuteh ka leumah Sulaiman kheun nyoe meuligoe kaca Meulaen rupa takalon ubah Putroe kheun Tuhan lon elanya droe Jinoe lon jok droe bak droe-Neuh Allah Ka lon Islam sajan Sulaiman Tuhan Po alam jinoe lon seumah
